content: Where is the asexual (gonadless) faux mensch Paul Ryan right now when he should be drawing up impeachment proceedings against crooked donnie for flouting and flaunting his breaking of the emoulments clause of the Constitution of the United States of America? We all know that crooked donnie lied when he swore to uphold the Constitution. he cannot help himself, just like the scorpion crossing the river on the frog’s back. But Ryan on the other hand has portrayed himself as a strict constitutionalist. He knows what crooked donnie has done and yet he refuses to uphold the Constitution.
